#### <s class="topic-title">[[Pranamaya Kosha]]</s> 

It is the energy [[body]], composed of "[[Qi]]" or "Prana", which is in continuous flow within us.
^[[Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health](https://coaching.healthygamer.gg/guide)]
